constructor-arg.value: select bl.name as "Name:", bl.bagseq_library_id as "Library id:", (select g.name from genome g where bl.genome_id = g.genome_id) as "Host Name:", bl.host_genome_id as "Host id:", (select count(*) from bagseq_fragment bf where bl.bagseq_library_id = bf.bagseq_library_id) as "Fragment count:", (select count(*) from barseq_experiment be where bl.bagseq_library_id = be.bagseq_library_id) as "Experiment count:" from bagseq_library bl where bl.bagseq_library_id = %d

select be."name" as "Condition", sum(case when bgs.score_cnnls >= 4 then 1 else 0 end) as "High Scoring Genes", be.itnum as "itnum", be.barseq_experiment_id "experiment id" from barseq_experiment be inner join barseq_gene_score bgs on be.barseq_experiment_id = bgs.barseq_experiment_id where be.bagseq_library_id = %d group by be."name", be.barseq_experiment_id order by "High Scoring Genes" desc, 1
